platformForecastSales.name: Nintendo Switch Software Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Software sales units include both packaged and downloadable versions of software, and do not include download-only software or add-on content. Actual software sales units include the quantity bundled with hardware or other products. Forecasted software sales units includes software bundled with other products. Packaged versions of Nintendo Switch 2 Edition software are included in Nintendo Switch 2 software sales units, and downloadable versions are included in Nintendo Switch software sales units. Sales of upgrade packs are not included in software. Nintendo Switch 2 Hardware Total Forecast FY3/2026: 15M, Nintendo Switch 2 Software Total Forecast FY3/2026: 45M

platformForecastSales.name: Nintendo Switch 2 Software Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Software sales units include both packaged and downloadable versions of software, and do not include download-only software or add-on content. Actual software sales units include the quantity bundled with hardware or other products. Forecasted software sales units includes software bundled with other products. Packaged versions of Nintendo Switch 2 Edition software are included in Nintendo Switch 2 software sales units, and downloadable versions are included in Nintendo Switch software sales units. Sales of upgrade packs are not included in software
